comments: Lowry's (MIA) left arm brushes Aldama's (MEM) front and the contact during Aldama's cut is marginal.
Lowry (MIA) momentarily grasps Aldama's (MEM) left arm and removes the marginal contact as the shot bounces off of the rim.
Aldama (MEM) swings his arm toward the ball and illegal arm contact occurs with Adebayo (MIA), which impacts his ability to corral the rebound.
Robinson (MIA) grabs and holds Kennard's (MEM) left arm, which affects his FOM as he moves off-ball.
Kennard (MEM) and Robinson (MIA) engage and disengage away from the ball and the contact is marginal.
Jackson Jr. (MEM) firms up over his right leg and marginal contact occurs with Robinson (MIA) as he defends over the screen.
Smart (MEM) firms up in Lowry's (MIA) path and marginal contact occurs as the two players come together during the screen.
Jackson Jr. (MEM) and Butler (MIA) come together in the paint as they jostle for position and the contact is marginal.
Jackson Jr. (MEM) is in the lane for less than three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Butler's (MIA) hand slides off of the ball and makes contact with Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) wrist, which affects his shot attempt in the paint.
Jackson Jr. (MEM) brings his hand toward the ball and his right arm briefly rests on Adebayo's (MIA) side and the marginal contact dissolves shortly thereafter.
Adebayo (MIA) is in the lane for longer than three seconds.
Jackson Jr. (MEM) reaches in and initiates illegal contact with Robinson's (MIA) arm before he re-plants his pivot foot.  A personal foul should have been called instead of a traveling violation.
Butler (MIA) places a resting hand on Bane's (MEM) side and the contact during the driving shot attempt is marginal.
Lowry (MIA) comes together with Bane (MEM) during the change of possession and the marginal contact dissolves shortly thereafter.
Lowry (MIA) requests a time out from the game official within five seconds of receiving the ball during the inbound.
Smart (MEM) and Butler (MIA) engage during the inbound and the contact is marginal.
Adebayo (MIA) firms up in Smart's (MEM) path and marginal contact occurs as Smart defends over the pick.
Butler (MIA) momentarily brings his hands to Smart's (MEM) front and marginal contact occurs as Butler releases away from the defender during the screen.
Jaquez Jr. (MIA) lightly brushes Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) front as the two players engage during the inbound and the contact is marginal.
Bane (MEM) places and immediately removes his hand from Lowry's (MIA) front and the contact during the drive is marginal.
Bane (MEM) raises his hand into the ball and dislodges it from Lowry's (MIA) grasp. Any arm contact after the dislodge is considered incidental.
Smart (MEM) moves toward Adebayo (MIA) and marginal contact occurs as Adebayo secures the pass.
Lowry's (MIA) hand brushes Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) back after the release of the pass and the contact is marginal.
Adebayo (MIA) contests Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) jump shot and the contact after the release, and follow-through, is marginal.
